研究确定了SCA6诊断的关键遗传标记Niigata大学神经病学系以及国家神经病学和精神病学NCNP的国家中心已经确定了导致SCA6的CACNA1A基因的CAG重复单元（RU）的致病阈值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-indistifies-key-genetic-markers-for-sca6-diarosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-istifies-key-genetic-markers-for-sca6-diarosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99a4444bfc-a9a2-4a3f-ada0-ada0-4c7f37274b66 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 09:14:46 -0500 Study identifies key genetic markers for SCA6 diagnosis
新的血液生物标志物可以彻底改变胆囊癌的诊断Karolinska Institutet和Karolinska大学医院的研究人员已经确定了血液中的生物标志物，可将胆囊癌与胆囊炎症区分开来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/new-blood-biomarkers-could-revolutions-gallbladder-gallbladder-cancer-diangnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/new-blood-biomarkers-could-revolution-gallbladder-gallbladder-cancer-diarning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a465703-962e-469f-99d3-99d3-9cfe8c2d5848 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 08:50:00 -0500 New blood biomarkers could revolutionize gallbladder cancer diagnosis

皮肤类正弦可以显示治疗冻伤伤害的希望冻伤是一种严重的冷损伤，影响了全球数百万，通常导致康复，疤痕和长期并发症（例如慢性疼痛和功能障碍）的长期康复，疤痕和长期并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/skin-organoids-show-promise-formise-for-treating-frostbite-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/skin-organoids-show-promise-formise-for-treating-frostbite-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A882B0DD-2141-4296-9BBF-B61075FACD0A Mon, 03 Mar 2025 08:29:44 -0500 Skin organoids show promise for treating frostbite injuries

面临医生短缺的州简化外国训练医生的许可规则越来越多的州使在其他国家培训的医生更容易获得医疗许可，这是一个转变的支持者说，可以缓解农村地区的医生短缺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/states-facing-doctor-shortages-shortages-shortages-licensing-rules-for-fore-fored-foreign-fored-physicians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/states-facing-doctor-shortages-shortages-shortages-licens-licensing-rules-for-foreign-foreign-forenain-physicians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f82a30d1-ad2a-4a8a-9c4a-9c4a-4ae-4ae223995992 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 07:39:51 -0500 States facing doctor shortages ease licensing rules for foreign-trained physicians

DeepHealth将AI驱动的放射学信息学带到了Vienna的ECR 2025 DeepHealth，Inc。是AI驱动的健康信息学的全球领导者，也是Radnet，Inc。的全资子公司，将在欧洲放射学大会（ECR）2025的下一代AI驱动的放射学信息和人口筛查解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/deephealt-brings-brings-ai-power-radiology-informatics-informatics-to-ecr-2025-in-vienna.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/deepheaph-brings-ai-power-radiology-informatics-informatics-to-ecr-2025-in-vienna.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=361813b5-b114-45de-A377-377-3CEF5A3C2328 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 00:13:00 -0500 DeepHealth brings AI-powered radiology informatics to ECR 2025 in Vienna
Medtronic获得Brainsense自适应DBS技术的FDA批准对于美国医疗保健技术的全球领导者Medtronic Plc（NYSE：MDT）的一百万诊断为帕金森氏病的人，自豪地宣布了美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）批准BRAINSENSE™自适应深度大脑刺激（ADBS）和BRAINSENSER™Electrode™电极标识符（EI）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/medtronic-receives-fda-approval-for-brainsense-aptive-aptive-dbs-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/medtronic-receives-fda-approval-for-brains-aptive-aptive-dbs-dbs-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=321985A9-7AF5-4E9B-ABD2-768F12BE61A0 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 00:06:00 -0500 Medtronic receives FDA approval for BrainSense Adaptive DBS technology
